title: Pls suggest me cheap non marking shoes for badminton and other courts
content: I didn't know that they were so strict about shoes. Also didn't know that you require different shoes for courts otherwise I would've bought them as recently I bought new shoes ;(

comments.body: if youre not too worried about quality asics and apacs are some of the cheapest. there are different levels of prices in each, so its better for you to go to a sports store nearby to check them out. they last for a good one or two years with frequent (twice a week) and rough use. speaking from experience.
Thanks..... also can you pls tell me how are these? https://www.amazon.in/dp/B0C8NR2YYZ?language=en_US&ref_=cm_sw_r_mwn_dp_WMN1ZYRRG5VMCJACCV7K&starsLeft=1

Nah bro

I'd recommend you only to purchase from Yonex, lining, apacs and victor as they're known for badminton.
How are Asics? Are they better than Yonex?
never seen these. I highly recommend you try on a few pairs at sports stores nearby. the owners also have good knowledge and will help you choose something good.
Can you suggest any good stores.

Better goto nearby Decathlon store

You can get cheap and best shoes
Try the Hundred Raze badminton shoes theyâ€™re good too!
